treasureclues.clue.text.desert_pyramid:
%5$s,
I spied a temple made of sand.

At %2$s %1$s and %4$s %3$s,
I left a chest upon the land.
treasureclues.clue.text.pillager_outpost:
%5$s,
by wooden tower I got chased.

Go %2$d %1$s and %4$d %3$s,
to find the secret chest I placed.
treasureclues.clue.text.jungle_pyramid:
%5$s
a stony temple caught my eye.

'Round %2$d %1$s and %4$d %3$s,
a secret chest for you may lie.
treasureclues.clue.text.igloo:
%5$s,
a frosty dome of snow I found.

At %2$s %1$s and %4$s %3$s,
I placed a chest on chilly ground.
treasureclues.clue.text.ruined_portal:
%5$s,
a broken gateway sat apart.

To %2$s %1$s and %4$s %3$s,
your journey you should promptly start.
treasureclues.clue.text.shipwreck:
%5$s,
I saw a crew had lost their way.

Near %2$s %1$s and %4$s %3$s,
you may now head without delay.
treasureclues.clue.text.swamp_hut:
%5$s,
I heard a cackle from a hut.

To %2$s %1$s and %4$s %3$s,
you should make way without a but.
treasureclues.clue.text.ocean_ruin:
%5$s,
a stony ruin met my gaze.

By %2$s %1$s and %4$s %3$s,
a heavy chest now spends its days.
treasureclues.clue.text.village:
%5$s,
a mumbling fellow gave me pause.

Nigh %2$s %1$s and %4$s %3$s,
the chest of secrets closer draws.
treasureclues.clue.text.biome.plains: Where grass and flowers paved my way
treasureclues.clue.text.biome.beach: Where lapping water met the shore
treasureclues.clue.text.biome.desert: Parched of throat, with burning feet
treasureclues.clue.text.fallback: Weary my feet, I will now take rest, go north ten steps and there find my chest.
treasureclues.invalid_dimension: Dimensional interference prevents you from reading this note here.
treasureclues.error.missing_chest: Oh no! Imps seems to have stolen the treasure! Sorry!
